title: 'GM Street’ — Tales From the Draft War Room With Mike Lombardi (Ep. 102)
description:
The Ringer's Mike Lombardi and Tate Frazier discuss Mitchell Trubisky's future (02:00), the NFL draft experience before cellphones (05:00), and trading down to buy time (08:00). Then Lombardi shares a few draft stories from his days working with Al Davis (12:00) and Bill Belichick (24:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
